intro: Build your town, feed and arm your settlers and watch out for the undead coming at night! Survive as much as you can
description:
-Mix elements of RTS, roguelikes and survival
-Juggle your settlers needs such as food, fatigue or happiness
-Prepare your settlers with weapons and armors
-Battle hordes of increasingly stronger undead
-3 different levels of difficulty
-A shop for permanent progression
-See how long can your town last before the undead wipe you out. It's not a matter IF you will survive but rather how long.
